title: Successful instruction - an illustrated lecture
creator_credit: T.L. Rich, Ronald H. Riley and R.H.R. Productions
brief_description: A dramatised lecture on instruction intended for those learning to teach. A young officer gives a detailed explanation of the three principles of good instruction - prepare and plan; promote and maintain the desire to learn; and confirm that instruction has been assimilated.
